attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app shut down all of the appliances in my house including my toaster oven, refrigerator, and my Amazon Alexa. Would never recommend buying such a glitchy app. It has given my MacBook viruses and porn ads keep popping up on my browser when my 7 year old son logs into Spelling City. Overall do not buy this app if you want your technology to run smoothly. My cousin’s bionic leg even stopped functioning when he downloaded this app. For some reason every piece of technology within a decent range stops working. Even my vibrator shut down after downloading it. The only thing that I can entertain myself with until the electrician comes and fixes my appliances is a single Yo-Yo from Chuck-E-Cheese. I’m very frustrated and require compensation from (I think his name is Tronald Dump?). I would like him to repay me for wasting my time by giving up on his re-election campaign and crawling back into the gutters of hell where he belongs.

attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review:
This crappy appy is such a waste of my time. I’ve been trying to download it for so long now. It’s ridiculous that the app took me a whole 3.5 weeks to only download it. Not only that but when I tried to open it, it completely crashed my phone. I managed to get my phone working again after spending money to get it fixed. I thought maybe it was just my phone so I downloaded it on my tablet and low and behold the stupid app wouldn’t open on there either and it took JUST AS LONG to download!

-1000/10 WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND

attributes.title: WACKKKK🧚🏼‍♀️✨
attributes.review: As a LaTiNaAaA i do not recommend this app. I thought they were giving away free tickets for willy wonkas chocolate factory since i saw an oompa loompa but those were lies😔✨.Plus it asked for my number and um chile Mr.Orange is kinda scary and i don’t want to get kidnapped🙈.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I think the absolute f*ck not. you probably had the right idea... but the wrong b*tch. This app DRAINED my bank account and as soon as I opened it I was told that my location and information was being sold all over the world to a number of shady accounts. Maybe Trump needs to get a lace front like 6ix9ine and take that dollar store bath mat off his head. LEAVE.
